name: Senior C++ Unreal Engine Developer
description:
At Inworld AI we are creating intelligent virtual avatars for VR / XR / Metaverse worlds. Our work will define how millions of people will play, learn, interact and cooperate in the near future.

We are a team of experts that have pioneered conversational AI platforms and generative models at API.AI (Dialogflow), Google, and DeepMind. We are continuing to build out our incredibly talented team, with experts in generative language models, emotions, speech synthesis, multimodal interaction, design, and 3D animation.

We’re funded by top-tier investors including Kleiner Perkins, CRV, and Meta.

We are building our core technology team now and are looking for a talented Senior C++ Unreal Engine Developer.

Qualifications

  • BS or MS Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field

  • Hands-on experience in game development

  • Advanced knowledge of C++

  • Proficiency in Unreal Engine 4/5

  • Proficiency in SDK development

  • Understanding of AI programming

  • Strong fundamentals in the data structures, algorithms, design patterns, and object-oriented programming

  • Intermediate English

Nice to have

  • Development experience using Unity

  • 3D graphic design and animation experience

  • AI developed for NPC

  • Experience with VR projects
